title: Determine dollar amount of tax from graph

content.description: The following questions are based on the diagram below, which shows the effect of a unit tax placed on a good.
content.question: According to the diagram, what is the dollar amount of the unit tax?

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
